backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, question/answer handling, and authorization checks for user and admin actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking product features to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in styling, routing, hooks, components, and music features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global background/border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount node and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup, hash routing, and page rendering within AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity flow with loading states and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users for a display name and saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App-wide layout with NavBar, footer, and wiring for background music controls passed into navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/NavBar.ts: Navigation bar component with route links, branding, and optional background music controls via a popover.
frontend/src/components/moderation/AddAn: Form for moderators to submit compassionate answers with validation, character count, and mutation to save responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Hook that manages background audio playback, volume persistence, and error handling using an audio element.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, questions, answers, roles, and guidance text.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables with warm palette tones and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client provider, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the platform’s values and how it works using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AskPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to submit questions with validation, anonymous posting, and guidance text.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a hero section, important notice, and a sorted list of recent questions fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows a branded login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionDetailPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed question info, metadata, and answers, with admin support for adding responses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, versioning, and a list of existing feature specifications for the Ask Big Sister app.
